section.name: Powered By Cayenne
section.p: If your site or project uses Cayenne as its Object-Relational engine, please drop a note to cayenne-user list or directly to "andrus at objectstyle.org". We are in the process of building success stories page where this information will be included.

Also we developed a few web badges to enable you to endorse Cayenne technology. Help us to spread the word and promote Cayenne. If your site or project uses Cayenne, you may put one of the following badges on the site. Badge should be configured as an active link to Cayenne website: http://objectstyle.org/cayenne/
